titles: The traytors downfall, or, A brief relation of the downfall of that phanatick crew who traiterously murthered the late kings majesty of blessed memory. To the tune of, Fa la la, &c.
notes: Date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Right half-sheet contains: The second part to the same tune.
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
keywords: Charles --  I, --  King of England, 1600-1649 --  Poetry.
